channel.title: hello world on Maurício Antunes
channel.description: Recent content in hello world on Maurício Antunes

item.title: Welcome
item.description: A long time ago I decided that I should have a blog to share my thoughts about this kind and cruel world. And it is here now. It was born. When younger (about 8 years ago) I had a blog I used to share opinions about music and myself. And that was a very good experiencie which helped me evolve as a human being. Welcome to my blog.
